ygData.subject: EsterTheTester Speaks about bard Issues!
ygData.msgSnippet: Copied from the QA Forum on the EQ Boards. Author  Topic:   Why you didn t see me a lot today EsterTheTester Station Member   posted 08-15-2000 05:31 PM ...
ygData.messageBody:
Copied from the QA Forum on the EQ Boards.

Author Topic: Why you didn't see me a lot today
EsterTheTester
Station Member posted 08-15-2000 05:31 PM
----------------------------------------------------------------------
----------
Spent most of the day regressing fixed bugs.
Tomorrow (unless something big comes up) will be devoted to Bards. I
have a time set up with GZ to talk about everything, so I promise
progress is being made!!!

Now, I also promise to let you know what we find are bugs and what is
intentional when it comes to bards. Please just be a little more
paitent!!

Thanks guys

Ester
-----------------------------
Rosha Cristi, Bard of 51 {insert something musical here}
Guild Leader, Legends
Innoruuk
